attributes.action: I want Government to make a ruling about the flying of the English Flag.
attributes.background:
I would like the Government to make a ruling about the flying of the English Flag. Are we allowed to or not?

There are stories about people being shouted at and threatened for flying the English Flag. This has become worse over the past week.
Is it an offence to show your country flag?

rejection.details:
The Government has already produced a plain English guide to the rules on flying flags:

https://www.gov.uk/government/uploads/system/uploads/attachment_data/file/15438/flying_flags_guide.pdf
